page.title: 15Police Station Tebay
page.content:
A local policeman has been in the police force for 10 years.He joined in December 75.His worst case was one that involved 9 children who were killed.There are 1030 police in Cumbria, 31 women and 999 men.Tebay police force covers 6 areas which are Orton, Tebay,Raisbeck,Gasgill, Ravenstonedale and Shap,and it is stationed at Tebay. The station has 3 bedrooms, kitchen bathroom,patio,pantry,living room and 2 cells and is painted white.In every rooms except the cells there is a log fire which are no longer used. The only piece of transport he has is a Austin mini Metro The police station was bulit in 1906 the office is attached to the house.
Kerry Francis,Philip Combes.
